title: Google Backs Carbon-Captured Gas to Power Its AI Future
description: Google has signed the first U.S. corporate power purchase agreement involving natural gas with carbon capture, marking a major shift in how Big Tech plans to fuel the data-hungry future of artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Apple accelerates AI server production in Houston after Trump push
description: EXCLUSIVE: Apple is now building and shipping American-made Artificial Intelligence servers in the United States— a move that has the technology giant answering President Trump’s call to onshore manufacturing.
content:
EXCLUSIVE: Apple is now building and shipping American-made artificial intelligence servers in the United States — a move that has the technology giant answering President Donald Trump’s call to on shore manufacturing.

title: LDS apostle speaks in Vatican City about the need for A.I. ethics
description: Latter-day Saint apostle Gerrit Gong attends a summit on artificial intelligence in Vatican City and urges faith leaders to evaluate A.I. ethics.
content: Speaking this week at a faith and technology summit in Vatican City, apostle Gerrit W. Gong of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints pleaded with religious leaders around the globe to champion ethical and moral use of artificial intelligenc... [1564 chars]

title: Cargill Taps AI to Get More Meat Off Bone as Cattle Herd Slumps
description: Cargill Inc. is turning to artificial intelligence to ensure it gets more beef from its processing plants as the US cattle herd dwindles to the lowest level in seven decades.
content:
Cargill Inc. is turning to artificial intelligence to ensure it gets more beef from its processing plants as the US cattle herd dwindles to the lowest level in seven decades.

title: OpenAI Acquires AI Startup Founded By Former Apple Employees
description: OpenAI has acquired Software Applications Inc., a startup building an AI-powered user interface for Mac desktops, part of a push by the ChatGPT maker to improve how artificial intelligence tools field tasks on a computer.
content:

title: MeitY Hosts Curtain Raiser for ESTIC 2025, Emphasising AI for Social Impact
description: The 2025 edition will focus on “Artificial Intelligence for Social Impact”, reflecting India’s determination to harness AI for inclusive growth and digital empowerment.
content: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) hosted a Curtain Raiser event on October 23, 2025, to kick off preparations for the upcoming Emerging Science, Technology, and Innovation Conclave (ESTIC) 2025. The event sought to build ... [5617 chars]

title: UAE President issues resolution reconstituting Artificial Intelligence & Advanced Technology Council

title: Can India's balanced approach to AI regulation foster innovation without stifling progress?
description: The Competition Commission of India (CCI) is diving deep into the world of Artificial Intelligence, taking a thoughtful detour compared to regions hurriedly implementing regulations. Their latest findings outline both the promising opportunities and potential dangers of AI, advocating for a thorough understanding before any regulatory action.
content:

title: Microsoft debuts Mico, Copilot's AI alternative to Clippy
description: Microsoft introduced a new artificial intelligence character called Mico (pronounced MEE'koh) on Thursday.
content:
Clippy, the animated paper clip that annoyed Microsoft Office users nearly three decades ago, might have just been ahead of its time.
